author: Simon Difford
description: Creamy tequila and chocolate this tequila based riff on the classic Brandy Alexander is deliciously indulgent.
name: Tequila Alexander
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Dark crème de cacao liqueur
15 ml White crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
